titleInfo.title: Epistemology and Spiritual Authority: The Development of Epistemology and Logic in the Old Nyāya and Buddhist School of Epistemology, with an Annotated Translation of Dharmakīrti's Pramāṇavārttika II (Pramāṇasiddhi) vv. 1-7 (Wiener Studien zur Tibetologie und Buddhismuskunde, Heft 20)

originInfo.publisher: Arbeitskreis für Tibetische und Buddhistische Studien Universität Wien
